content.data: The warriors grinding their teeth in anger will cause their horses to dance from both sides, they will discharged arrows from their bows in the war-arena and will cut the saddles of horses and the armours.322.
(ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨਾਲ) ਘੋੜਿਆਂ ਦੀਆਂ (ਲੋਹੇ ਦੀਆਂ ਜਾਲੀਦਾਰ) ਝੁਲਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਕਵਚ ('ਸਨਾਹਿਨ') ਭੰਨਣਗੇ ॥੩੨੨॥
